name: Rajiv Khanna
content: Rajiv Khanna - Department of Computer Science - Purdue University Skip to content Home People Faculty Rajiv Khanna Faculty & Lecturers Staff Offices Rajiv Khanna Assistant Professor of Computer Science Rajiv Khanna is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science. His research interests span various subfields of machine learning including optimization, theory and interpretability. Previously, he held positions of Visiting Faculty Researcher at Google, postdoctoral scholar at Foundations of Data Analystics Institute at University of California, Berkeley and a Research Fellow in the Foundations of Data Science program at the Simons Instituâ¦ âMore Joined department: Spring 2022 Research Areas Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, and Natural Language Processing Education PhD, University of Texas at Austin, ECE (2018) Rajiv Khanna is an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science. His research interests span various subfields of machine learning including optimization, theory and interpretability. Previously, he held positions of Visiting Faculty Researcher at Google, postdoctoral scholar at Foundations of Data Analystics Institute at University of California, Berkeley and a Research Fellow in the Foundations of Data Science program at the Simons Institute also at UC Berkeley. He graduated with his PhD from UT Austin. Contact Info rajivak@purdue.edu DSAI 3112 Websites My Homepage Google Scholar
